channel.title: New summary of location changes in 1.04
channel.description:
The IATI Tech Team updated iatistandard.org today. We have added a summary of changes to the location element that were made in version 1.04 of the standard:
http://iatistandard.org/upgrades/decimal-upgrade-to-1-04/location-summary/
